tool_description: The easiest cloud file storage api
name: Simple File Storage
title: Simple File Storage

api_list.name: GET
api_list.description:
Get previously uploaded file using the file_id. 
(file_id is returned from the UPLOAD endpoint)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://simple-file-storage.p.rapidapi.com/files/e2ab50b6-0252-468b-8e76-700f60926b05"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "simple-file-storage.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://simple-file-storage.p.rapidapi.com/files/{file_id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "simple-file-storage.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
